ValidationRule.description: The phone OR the email field must be filled out on the lead record prior to Save.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK( Phone ) && ISBLANK( Email ) && OR(OR(CreatedById <> "005C0000003VWml", NOT(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,""))), (CreatedById <> "005C0000003VWml" && NOT(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,"")))) && $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone or Email must be entered to save.
